original_text: Because I knew that thou art obstinate, and thy neck is an iron sinew, and thy brow brass;
korean_text: 내가 알거니와 너는 완고하며 네 목은 쇠의 힘줄이요 네 이마는 놋이라

sentences.original_text: Because I knew that thou art obstinate
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네가 완고하다는 것을 알았기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and thy neck is an iron sinew
